Donors' support7 Significant Subsequent Events  
1.Under the agreement with Ukraine based crowdfunding  
non-profit organization "Garage Gang", Hromadske.tv has 
collected UAH 1.02 mln, excluding the fee charged by the 
crowdfunding  organization (as per the date of the report's 
issue ). 
2.In late December, the Auction House " Dukat " initiated the 
Auction of the Ukrainian artists' paintings on which they 
raised and subsequently transferred to Hromadske.tv UAH 
207 thousand . 
3.During first two months of 2014, Hromadske.tv has obtained 
direct support of the citizens in total amount of UAH 1.22 
mln.
